summary: Orchestrates the complete pipeline for constructing and training a collaborative‑filtering recommendation model from Google Analytics 4 logs, handling data extraction from BigQuery, preprocessing, building a user‑item interaction matrix, training an ALS model, generating latent factor representations, scoring events, and saving the trained artifacts.
business_intent: Enable data‑driven personalized recommendations by turning raw event logs into a trained model that can predict user preferences, thereby enhancing user engagement and driving business value.
